line_1: Hear men, most loose, for decency declaim,
line_2: And talk of Character, without a name;

line_1: 'Gainst pride in man with equal pride declaim,
line_2: And hide ill-nature under virtue's name?

line_1: So when at School we first declaim,
line_2: Old Busbey walks us in a Theme,

line_1: VIle Infidel, that dar'st for Vice declaim,
line_2: And take vain pride to Publish thy own shame!
Who talk of Raphael's matchless fame,
